about_the_game: Discover the diversity of Mexico - take on new and challenging missions in the arid northern regions all the way to the dense jungles in the south of the country. Boost Mexico’s economy in the new scenario by building a thriving infrastructure and exporting to the USA.
detailed_description:
Feature List

  • New scenario: “Viva Mexico!” (1873-1893)
  • Map expansion: Mexico (available in Free Game and Sandbox modes)
  • New goods (e.g. coffee and sugar) and more than 24 new cities
  • New engines: Fairlie (0-6-6-0) and Stirling (4-2-2)
  • Explore the world of Railway Empire in a new exclusive night mode


About the Game

Discover the diversity of Mexico - take on new and challenging missions in the arid northern regions all the way to the dense jungles in the south of the country. Boost Mexico’s economy in the new scenario by building a thriving infrastructure and exporting to the USA.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04.3 LTS + SteamOS (latest)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 750 @ 2.6 GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 @ 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX460 or AMD Radeon HD5870 (1024MB VRAM with Shader Model 5.0)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04.3 LTS + SteamOS (latest)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2400s @ 2.5 GHz or AMD FX 4100 @ 3.6
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 680 or AMD Radeon HD7970 or better (2048MB VRAM or more, with Shader Model 5.0)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers

name: Railway Empire - Mexico

short_description: Discover the diversity of Mexico - take on new and challenging missions in the arid northern regions all the way to the dense jungles in the south of the country.
